description: This file is an ESLint configuration script for a project, specifying linting rules, parser options, and plugins tailored for JavaScript, Svelte, and TypeScript files.

methods.name: ts.config
methods.description: Configures ESLint with TypeScript recommendations and additional project-specific settings.

methods.name: includeIgnoreFile
methods.description: Includes ignore patterns from a specified file into the ESLint configuration.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a URL object to a file system path string.
